channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Clearwater Analytics went on a buying spree. Now it’s getting bought in an $8.4 billion deal.
item.description: Clearwater Analytics over the weekend agreed to a buyout from private-equity firms, after the stock market failed to reward a string of acquisitions t...

item.title: The so-called ‘great debasement trade’ is back on as gold sets fresh record, says this strategist
item.description: A rise in geopolitical tensions and the search for inflation hedges are fuelling the surge in precious metal prices

item.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: ‘Springsteen’ star Jeremy Allen White on his favorite reality shows and obsession with real estate
item.description: The actor says he likes to “decompress” by perusing properties he knows he’ll likely never buy.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
